author: hyunggi_dsrv
content: Hey guys, What is the SPECIAL CONTRIBUTION PERIOD?

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Special contributions, by trusted entities or on special hardware (that takes longer than 1 minute to contribute) etc. Just a way to make it even more secure

author: hyunggi_dsrv
content:
https://github.com/ethereum/kzg-ceremony#cli-interfaces
https://github.com/dsrvlabs/czg-keremony

I've implemented it and my PR is merged, can I contribute during the special cotribution period?

author: bridge-bot
content: <CarlBeek> There will be another public contribution period after the special contribution period ends on Apr 16. You should be able to contibute then. That said, if you really want a special contribution slot and are prepared to do the calcs in an airgapped manner then we can probably alocate you a slot.
